title: Need help with this homework
content: Homework 9 is giving me a lot of trouble. Anyone have any suggestions on how to start?

title: Not sure how to align these two divs properly
content: I want two of my divs to be aligned horizontally, but I forget how to do that.

title: Does anyone know a good resource on responsive design?
content: I really want to improve some previous assignments with responsive design. I'm not sure where to look though. Does anyone have any good resources on responsive design?

title: Not sure why I can't do a git pull
content: I get a weird error message whenever I try to do a git pull, but I don't know what it means. Has anyone come across this or know how to fix it?

title: My javascript isn't working!!
content: I made a function that makes some text appear when you click on a button. But when I try it on my page, nothing happens. Any idea why this might be happening?

title: Anyone want to meet up and study for the next homework?
content: Express has been giving me a lot of trouble and I know this homework is going to be tough for me. If anyone would want to meet up and tackle this together, let me know!

title: No matter what I try, my server won't connect.
content: I copied the code from the previous class assignment exactly, but it still won't connect. I'm not sure what else to try!

title: Anyone else not able to log in to bootcampspot?
content: I keep trying to log in but the page just loads forever. Is this just me or are others having issues as well?

title: Just want to say thanks to all the teachers and tutors!
content: Jeff and Dan and all of the tutors have been so helpful! Just wanted to shout them out and say thanks for all of their hard work.
